name: cloudflow-pro-ai
description: A modern file management web application with a secure backend for AI features.
author: AI Studio

comments.setup: To run this project: 1. Create a '.env' file from '.env.example' and add your Gemini API key. 2. Run 'npm install' or 'npm run install-dependencies' in your terminal. 3. Run 'npm start' to launch the server. 4. Open http://localhost:3000 in your browser.
